This project contains code from other projects listed below. The original license
text is included in those source files.

  the BSD-3-Clause license.  See
    * cmake/Catch.cmake
    * cmake/CatchAddTests.cmake
* The Catch2 header 'catch2/catch.hpp' used by tests, licensed under the
  Boost Software License, Version 1.0.  See
    * third_party/catch2/vendor/catch2/catch.hpp
